channel.title: CVE Feed for Trend Micro, Inc. -- Trend Micro Security (Consumer) uiAirSupport
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Trend Micro, Inc. -- Trend Micro Security (Consumer) uiAirSupport

item.title: CVE-2024-23940|2024-01-29T18:22:34.819Z -- Trend Micro, Inc. -- Trend Micro Security (Consumer) uiAirSupport
item.description: Trend Micro uiAirSupport, included in the Trend Micro Security 2023 family of consumer products, version 6.0.2092 and below is vulnerable to a DLL hijacking/proxying vulnerability, which if exploited could allow an attacker to impersonate and modify a library to execute code on the system and ultimately escalate privileges on an affected system.
